name: eSankhyiki (MoSPI)
description: A data platform developed by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, Government of India, providing a single point of access to all publicly available datasets of the ministry, designed to make the datasets easy to find, download and share. It features a Data Catalogue and Macro Indicators module, with tools for filtering, visualization, and data download.
owner_name: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MoSPI), Government of India
